Package atoa.roomates.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddBillActivity
    class to represents the add bill screen resposbile for adding new bill to the app data base
    AddRoommateActivity
    class to represent the add roommate screen the class lets the user select contact from his contact list and adds them to the app daat base
    AddRoommateActivity.Contact
    inner class for contact representation.
    ApartmentNotesActivity
    class to represents to notes screen lets the user add notes,delete notes and view other users notes
    ApartmentStatusActivity
    class to represent the apartment status screen shows the user the apartment bills status and a pie chart which shows the amount payed by each user
    BillsActivity
    class to represents the bill screen shows the apartment current bills and lets the user add new bills or delete existing bills
    EditBillActivity
    class to represent the edit bill screen where user can edit existing bills
    HomeActivity
    the app main screen.
    LoginActivity
    class to represents the login screen responsible for user login.
    PhoneValidationActivity
    class represents the phone validation screen responsible for validating the phone number by sending code in sms to the phone number which the user entered and them asking him to enter the received code and validating it
    QuestionAndAnswersActivity
    class to represent the common questions and answers screen
    RegistraionActivity
    class to represent the registration screen respomsible for adding the user to the app data base
    RoomatesActivity
    class which represents the roommates screen of the app the user can see the list of roommates of the apartment, and add/delete roommates
    SelectBillActivity
    class to represents the different types of bills when the user wish to add a new bill he has to choose the bill type from an ENUM class which represents the bill types
    ShopCartActivity
    activity which the user can see the apartment shopping list and add\delete products to the list the data is retried from remote data base by a php script on the
